entries.meaning: (slang, chiefly Internet slang) A hearty laugh that is punctuated by a snort on the inhale.

verbs.description: snortle (third-person singular simple present snortles, present participle snortling, simple past and past participle snortled)

entries.meaning: (slang) To give a hearty laugh that is punctuated by a snort on the inhale.
examples: Brooke looked quite elegant in her gown until she snortled and champagne came out of her nose.
